name: Suck It Up
description:
Buckle up, space pilot!! Suck It Up puts you in control of an Unidentified Sucking Object on a mission to collect all animals and plants for collection and research. Evade enemies and traps as you journey further and discover rare animals, plants and other joyful surprises. Each cute animal group provides a unique pattern that will challenge you. Become the very best by collecting and upgrading them all!

Earn high scores by quickly planning your flying paths to earn combos and charge up into Frenzy Mode.

Complete challenging missions to unlock daily chests and receive sweet prizes.

* Over 50 unlockable animals & plants, each with useful upgrades.
* Over 30 cute space pilots to unlock and discover.
* Hundreds of challenging missions to complete.
* New Chest rewards to be earned every day.

What are you waiting for ? Come fly and suck it up with us now!

Thank you for playing - Kiseki Games
